senses.synonym: 00015933-r (in a satisfactory or adequate manner; \""she'll do okay on her own\""; \""held up all right under pressure\""; (`alright' is a nonstandard variant of `all right'));00053542-r (an expression of agreement normally occurring at the beginning of a sentence);00053690-r (without doubt (used to reinforce an assertion); \""it's expensive all right\"");02088638-a (nonstandard usage
